rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample space for a small foyer. Vastu principle: Facing the east direction to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows oriented towards the north-east for natural light and ventilation. Kerala-style wooden beams enhance traditional aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Cozy dining space adjacent to the living room, with window openings towards the north-west for balanced light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene bedroom designed with natural ventilation and light. Placed on the western side in accordance to Vastu guidelines for privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-planned bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with necessary ventilation openings and minimal moisture retention. Windows placed on north side as per Vastu for cleanliness.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen layout designed in line with Kerala traditions, with east-facing windows for optimal morning light and positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library area with ample shelving, north-facing window for natural light conducive to reading. Emphasizes quiet and intellectual atmosphere in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Storage & Utility
rooms.description: Compact utility room designed to house essential storage, placed away from the main living areas to maintain aesthetic flow. Windows on south-west side for balanced light and ventilation.
